articles.description: DC has revealed that Jon Kent, the son of Clark Kent and Lois Lane, and Earth’s new Superman, is bisexual.
articles.content: And in this respect, the Jon Kent version of Superman is closer to the original vision of the character as created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster than nearly any weve seen since in the last 80 years… [+3570 chars]
